## Description {#details}

Special <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorinfo">ErrorInfo</a> subclass representing a list of ErrorInfos.

Instances of this class are constructed by joinError.

Definition at line 370 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/error-h">Error.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Friends

### handleErrors {#a2c831eabfe62504c9cc0cc16e0799c44}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>friend <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> E, HandlerTs &amp;&amp;... Handlers</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> the ErrorInfo(s) contained in E to their respective handlers.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> unhandled errors (or Errors returned by handlers) are re-concatenated and returned. Because this function returns an error, its result must also be checked or returned. If you intend to handle all errors use handleAllErrors (which returns void, and will abort() on unhandled errors) instead.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/error-h/#l00374">374</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/error-h">Error.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### joinErrors {#ab08cc727c18c44d888f4dce4903c8741}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>friend <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> NaN, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> NaN</>}>
Concatenate errors.

The resulting <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> is unchecked, and contains the ErrorInfo(s), if any, contained in E1, followed by the ErrorInfo(s), if any, contained in E2.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/error-h/#l00381">381</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/error-h">Error.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### visitErrors {#ac1eaa283b96012bf2a0f2e05d04a952a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>friend void <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> &amp; E, HandlerT H</>}>
Visit all the ErrorInfo(s) contained in E by passing them to the respective handler, without consuming the error.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/error-h/#l00378">378</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/error-h">Error.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### convertToErrorCode() {#a272eaea42b8132712f7381976f09eb41}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::error&#95;code llvm::ErrorList::convertToErrorCode () const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Convert this error to a std::error&#95;code.

This is a temporary crutch to enable interaction with code still using std::error&#95;code. It will be removed in the future.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/error-h/#l00392">392</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/error-h">Error.h</a>, definition at line 93 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/testing/lib/testing/support/error-cpp">Error.cpp</a>.
